author: daxian-dbw
body:
Major changes:
- Add links about PowerShell binary archives in README.md
- Update installation/linux.md and windows.md to use `pwsh` as appropriate.
- Add a section about binary archives to linux.md
- Add a section about zip archives to windows.md
- The `OpenSSL on macOS` section is removed from linux.md because it's not relevant now. In .NET Core 2.0, everything on macOS is provided by Security.framework. See the announcement [".NET Core 2.0 Cryptography uses Apple Security Framework on macOS"](https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/21) and the [corresponding PR](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/pull/17011)

Fix #3961 
Finish the last task -- Add documentation about Linux package dependencies
